title: People Who Are Always On Their Phones, These Are 13 Things I Want To Say To You
text:
People Who Are Always On Their Phones, These Are 13 Things I Want To Say To You

People Who Are Always On Their Phones, These Are 13 Things I Want To Say To You

If there is one thing that we are now obsessed with is our mobile phone. We keep it close to our hearts and it has become an indispensable part of our lives.

We need it when we poop, walk, work and everywhere else.

People are always on their phones and this is personally annoying me. So I am venting out and listing out things I want to say to people who can't keep their hands off their phone.

1. What did you do when you had no phone? Weren't you happier?

Unsplash

2. You are not making memories looking at your phone for hours at a stretch.

Unsplash

3. There is so much beauty in the world that you're missing out on while you are on your phone.

Unsplash

Don't Miss 217 SHARES 1 K SHARES 378 SHARES 442 SHARES

4. You might know all the filters, but do you know what your best friend is going through these day?

Unsplash

5. Texting all day long makes your thumbs scream. Stop it please.

Unsplash

6. The best moments that we cherish don't need phones.

Unsplash

7. Please listen when people are talking to you.

Unsplash

8. Please don't travel with me for Instagram pictures, travel with me if you want an actual vacation.

Unsplash

9. I'd rather watch a movie than spend time with people like you.

Unsplash

10. You are not only hurting people by giving more importance to your phone but also hurting your eyes. Give them some rest.

Unsplash

11. There is no substitute of real life experiences.

Unsplash

12. Can you please put your phone down already?

Unsplash

13. I am sorry, I do not want to friends with you.

Unsplash
